definition: EnergyAttrs are attributes that characterize energy consumption, efficiency, or power-related properties of systems and devices.

positive_examples: This refrigerator has an Energy Star rating for its low power consumption.
The washing machine displays an A++ energy efficiency class label.
The server system has real-time power monitoring capabilities.
This air conditioner meets European energy efficiency standards.
The device's energy consumption is rated at 50 watts per hour.
The appliance received an energy efficiency certification last year.
negative_examples: This phone has excellent build quality and durability.
The car has a sleek design and comfortable interior.
The software runs smoothly on older hardware.
This material has high tensile strength and flexibility.
The product comes with a two-year warranty.
The device has advanced security features and encryption.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: QualityAttribute, PerformanceAttribute, SecurityAttribute, DesignAttribute
